Open Access Anthropology

Nov 7, 2006

We’ve been very busy over at Savage Minds – promoting Open Access at the AAA. See our wiki for a general overview of the subject, or here to see what we are planning for the AAA. But what I really wanted to tell you about are the great new T-shirts Rex and CKelty designed for us!
